price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߣߍ߲ߞߍ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߣߐ߬ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
